member.name: T:DotNetNuke.Web.Services.AuthorizeAttributeBase
member.summary:
A base class for authorize attributes
This is based on the ASP.Net MVC AuthorizeAttribute, with an enhancemtn to pass AuthorizationContext to AuthorizeCore. The code to deal with the cache and set the result should be common to all AuthorizationFilters

member.name: T:DotNetNuke.Web.Services.IOverrideDefaultAuthLevel
member.summary: Implementing this interface on an Auth filter will allow the filter to override the default Host level auth provided by DnnController

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Web.Services.DnnAuthorizeAttribute.RequiresHost
member.summary: Indicates that Host level credentials are required

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Web.Services.DnnAuthorizeAttribute.AllowAnonymous
member.summary:
Allows authorization of anonymous users
AllowAnonymous is used to allow anonymous access to specific methods in a controller that has a higher DefaultAuthLevel This setting will be ignored if any of User, StaticRoles or Host level access are also specified

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Web.UI.WebControls.Extensions.ListControlExtensions.FindByTextWithIgnoreCase(System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection,System.String)
member.summary: Use this method instead of ListItemCollection.FindByText to find the specific item with case-insensitive.
member.param: the items.
the item with this text want to find.
member.returns: the specific item or null if didn't match the text with any item.

member.summary: Use this method instead of ListItemCollection.FindBValue to find the specific item with case-insensitive.

members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Loads the Post Back Data and determines whether the value has change
In this case because the is a contained control, we do not need to process the PostBackData (it has been handled by the File Control). We just use this method as the Framework calls it for us.
A key to the PostBack Data to load A name value collection of postback data
[cnurse] 08/01/2006 created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
